description.zh-cn: 中国战国末期卫国商人，后成为秦国丞相及政治家，被秦始皇尊为“仲父”。他广招门客编撰《吕氏春秋》，是先秦杂家的代表人物之一，对秦王政统一六国的事业有重大贡献。
description.en: A merchant from the state of Wei during the late Warring States period, who later became the Chancellor and a politician of the state of Qin. He was honored as 'Second Father' by Qin Shi Huang. He gathered scholars to compile the 'Lüshi Chunqiu' and is a representative figure of the Miscellaneous School of thought, making significant contributions to Qin's unification of the six states.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上首位完成华夏大一统的政治人物，也是中国第一个称皇帝的君主。
description.en: The first political figure to complete the unification of China, and the first monarch in China to be titled 'Emperor'.

description.zh-cn: 秦国国君，秦始皇的父亲。原在赵国作为人质，后在吕不韦的帮助下返回秦国并最终继位。
description.en: King of the state of Qin and the father of Qin Shi Huang. He was originally a hostage in the state of Zhao and later returned to Qin and ascended the throne with the help of Lü Buwei.

description.zh-cn: 秦庄襄王之妻，秦始皇的母亲。原为吕不韦的姬妾。
description.en: The wife of King Zhuangxiang of Qin and the mother of Qin Shi Huang. She was originally a concubine of Lü Buwei.

description.zh-cn: 秦始皇母亲赵姬的男宠，后因发动叛乱被秦始皇所杀。
description.en: A male favorite of Queen Dowager Zhao, the mother of Qin Shi Huang. He was later executed by Qin Shi Huang for launching a rebellion.

description.zh-cn: 秦国国君，秦庄襄王之父，在位时间极短。
description.en: King of the state of Qin, father of King Zhuangxiang of Qin. His reign was extremely short.

description.zh-cn: 秦孝文王的正夫人，无子，后收养异人（秦庄襄王）为义子。
description.en: The primary consort of King Xiaowen of Qin. Being childless, she adopted Yiren (King Zhuangxiang of Qin) as her son.

description.zh-cn: 秦国国君，秦孝文王之父，在位时间长达五十六年。
description.en: King of the state of Qin, father of King Xiaowen of Qin. His reign lasted for fifty-six years.

description.zh-cn: 东周国末代君主，后被吕不韦所杀。
description.en: The last ruler of the state of Eastern Zhou, who was killed by Lü Buwei.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代思想家，道家学派的创始人物。
description.en: An ancient Chinese philosopher and the founder of Taoism.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上战国时代的一个诸侯国，后统一六国建立秦朝。
description.en: A vassal state during the Warring States period of Chinese history, which later unified the six states and established the Qin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上周朝的一个姬姓诸侯国，吕不韦的出生地。
description.en: A vassal state of the Ji family name during the Zhou dynasty in Chinese history, the birthplace of Lü Buwei.

description.zh-cn: 中国战国时期从周王室分裂出的一个小国，后被秦国所灭。
description.en: A small state that split from the Zhou royal house during the Warring States period, later conquered by the state of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代思想流派，以“兼儒墨，合名法”为特点，吕不韦是其代表人物。
description.en: An ancient Chinese school of thought characterized by 'combining Confucianism and Mohism, integrating the School of Names and Legalism'. Lü Buwei is its representative figure.

description.zh-cn: 中国春秋战国时期各种学术流派的总称。
description.en: A collective term for the various academic schools of thought during the Spring and Autumn and Warring States periods in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代官职，为百官之长。
description.en: An official position in ancient China, the head of all civil officials.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代在今陕西省修建的水利工程，由秦国兴建。
description.en: An ancient hydraulic engineering project built in present-day Shaanxi province, constructed by the state of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 由秦国相邦吕不韦主持，集合其门客共同编撰的一部古代类百科全书式的著作，是杂家思想的代表作。
description.en: An ancient Chinese encyclopedic text compiled under the patronage of Lü Buwei, Chancellor of Qin, by his scholarly retainers. It is a representative work of the Miscellaneous School of thought.

description.zh-cn: 吕不韦在秦庄襄王元年（前249年）被任命为相邦，至秦王政十年（前237年）被罢免。
description.en: Lü Buwei was appointed Chancellor in the first year of King Zhuangxiang of Qin (-249) and was dismissed in the tenth year of King Zheng of Qin's reign (-237).

description.zh-cn: 吕不韦在赵国邯郸结识当时作为人质的嬴异人，认为其“奇货可居”，于是资助并帮助他返回秦国，通过游说华阳夫人使其被立为嫡子，最终登上王位。
description.en: In Handan, the capital of Zhao, Lü Buwei met Ying Yiren who was a hostage there. Believing him to be a 'rare commodity', Lü funded and assisted his return to Qin. By persuading Lady Huayang, he had Yiren established as the legitimate heir, ultimately enabling him to ascend the throne.

description.zh-cn: 在秦庄襄王去世、嬴政年幼继位后，吕不韦与太后赵姬私通。
description.en: After King Zhuangxiang's death and during the young King Zheng's reign, Lü Buwei had an illicit affair with the Queen Dowager Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 吕不韦招揽门客，合力编撰了《吕氏春秋》。
description.en: Lü Buwei recruited scholars and retainers to collaboratively compile the 'Lüshi Chunqiu'.

description.zh-cn: 因恐惧与太后私通事发，吕不韦找到嫪毐，将其伪装成宦官送入宫中侍奉太后，以转移太后的注意。
description.en: Fearing the discovery of his affair with the Queen Dowager, Lü Buwei found Lao Ai and had him disguised as a eunuch to serve the Queen Dowager in the palace, aiming to divert her attention.

description.zh-cn: 秦庄襄王元年（前249年），吕不韦奉命灭亡东周国。
description.en: In the first year of King Zhuangxiang's reign (-249), Lü Buwei was ordered to conquer the state of Eastern Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 在灭亡东周国时，奉命诛杀东周君。
description.en: During the conquest of the Eastern Zhou, he was ordered to execute the Lord of Eastern Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 执政期间，兴建了郑国渠等水利工程，促进了秦国农业生产。
description.en: During his administration, he initiated hydraulic engineering projects such as the Zheng Guo Canal, which boosted agricultural production in Qin.

description.zh-cn: 因嫪毐之乱的牵连，秦始皇于秦王政十年（前237年）罢免吕不韦的相邦职务，后将其流放至蜀地，最终导致吕不韦饮鸩自杀。
description.en: Due to his involvement in the Lao Ai rebellion, Qin Shi Huang dismissed Lü Buwei from his post as Chancellor in the tenth year of his reign (-237), later exiling him to Shu, which ultimately led Lü Buwei to commit suicide by drinking poison.

description.zh-cn: 秦王政十年（前237年），秦始皇下令调查并平定了嫪毐发动的叛乱，并将其诛杀。
description.en: In the tenth year of his reign (-237), Qin Shi Huang ordered an investigation and suppressed the rebellion launched by Lao Ai, subsequently having him executed.

description.zh-cn: 在平定嫪毐之乱后，秦始皇将母亲赵姬软禁，并毒杀了她与嫪毐的两个私生子。
description.en: After suppressing the Lao Ai rebellion, Qin Shi Huang placed his mother, Queen Dowager Zhao, under house arrest and poisoned her two illegitimate sons with Lao Ai.

description.zh-cn: 嫪毐被吕不韦送入宫后，深得太后赵姬专宠，并与其生下二子。
description.en: After being sent into the palace by Lü Buwei, Lao Ai became the exclusive favorite of Queen Dowager Zhao and had two sons with her.

description.zh-cn: 嫪毐集团发动叛乱，此事牵连了吕不韦，导致其被秦王政免除相邦职务。
description.en: The rebellion launched by Lao Ai's faction implicated Lü Buwei, leading to his dismissal from the post of Chancellor by King Zheng of Qin.

description.zh-cn: 秦庄襄王（异人）被其父秦孝文王（安国君）立为子嗣。
description.en: King Zhuangxiang (Yiren) was established as the heir by his father, King Xiaowen (Lord Anguo).

description.zh-cn: 在吕不韦的游说下，无子的华阳夫人收养异人为义子，并说服安国君立其为子嗣。
description.en: Persuaded by Lü Buwei, the childless Lady Huayang adopted Yiren as her son and convinced Lord Anguo to establish him as the heir.

description.zh-cn: 秦庄襄王继位后，任命吕不韦为相邦，封为文信侯。
description.en: After ascending the throne, King Zhuangxiang appointed Lü Buwei as Chancellor and ennobled him as Marquis Wenxin.

description.zh-cn: 根据该页面的信息框，老子是影响吕不韦的人物之一。
description.en: According to the infobox on this page, Laozi was one of the figures who influenced Lü Buwei.

description.zh-cn: 根据该页面的信息框，诸子百家是影响吕不韦的因素之一。
description.en: According to the infobox on this page, the Hundred Schools of Thought were one of the factors that influenced Lü Buwei.
